feed.title: Blog Title
feed.subtitle: This is a longer description about your blog.

entry.title: New Website!!!
entry.content:
Hello!!!

Hi! I'm Cass, and this is my website! I'd love to explain to you who I am, but I already have a page for that.

This website is where I plan to post updates and news on the projects I work on, and maybe even archive some old stuff I've made. I might post a track or two every once in a while, so if you love music, keep your eyes and ears peeled. . . 0_0

I don't have much to say right now, but you can be sure that I'll be posting a truckload of stuff here soon!

(as a matter of fact, I've got a not so little project in the works that I'd love to get into. . . eventually. . .)

But for now, that's all I have to say! Thank you for checking out my little website!


Signing off, Cass Preston
